subject: RE: [junit] Robot class in JDK 1.3

messageBody:
Hi,

I've tried to use Robot class to simulate mouse clicks in my GUI unit tests,
but tests were not that stable, sometimes they had failed for some reason.
Use of Component.dispatchEvent() method cured the problem. So, I'd recommend
to use dispatchEvent() in unit tests unit low level emulation the Robot
class provides is really needed.

--
